Title: Video Commander
Description: VideoCommander is a control interface for vlc player. It enables users to create play lists with start- and stop time and to play videos on a specified display.
HomeWiki:
Note: the project lives on github, now: https://github.com/feg-giessen/videocommander


Project Description
VideoCommander is a control interface for vlc player. It enables users to create play lists with start- and stop time and to play videos on a specified display.

The user interface is available in German (default) and English.
